a64multi5.name: a64multi5
a64multi5.long_name: Multicolor charset for Commodore 64, extended with 5th color (colram)

mpv_flags.name: mpv_flags
mpv_flags.help: Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders.

luma_elim_threshold.name: luma_elim_threshold
luma_elim_threshold.help: single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)

chroma_elim_threshold.name: chroma_elim_threshold
chroma_elim_threshold.help: single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)

error_rate.name: error_rate
error_rate.help: Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment.

qsquish.name: qsquish
qsquish.help: how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function)

rc_eq.name: rc_eq
rc_eq.help: Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.

border_mask.name: border_mask
border_mask.help: increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders

force_duplicated_matrix.name: force_duplicated_matrix
force_duplicated_matrix.help: Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming.

brd_scale.name: brd_scale
brd_scale.help: Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision

mpeg_quant.name: mpeg_quant
mpeg_quant.help: Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263

dpi.name: dpi
dpi.help: Set image resolution (in dots per inch)

dpm.name: dpm
dpm.help: Set image resolution (in dots per meter)

max_extra_cb_iterations.name: max_extra_cb_iterations
max_extra_cb_iterations.help: Max extra codebook recalculation passes, more is better and slower

skip_empty_cb.name: skip_empty_cb
skip_empty_cb.help: Avoid wasting bytes, ignore vintage MacOS decoder

max_strips.name: max_strips
max_strips.help: Limit strips/frame, vintage compatible is 1..3, otherwise the more the better

min_strips.name: min_strips
min_strips.help: Enforce min strips/frame, more is worse and faster, must be <= max_strips

strip_number_adaptivity.name: strip_number_adaptivity
strip_number_adaptivity.help: How fast the strip number adapts, more is slightly better, much slower

non_deterministic.name: non_deterministic
non_deterministic.help: Allow multithreading for e.g. context=1 at the expense of determinism

flv.name: flv
flv.long_name: FLV / Sorenson Spark / Sorenson H.263 (Flash Video)

even_rows_fix.help: Make number of rows even (workaround for some players)

tile-rows.help: Log2 of number of tile rows to use

enable-intrabc.help: Enable intra block copy prediction mode

fastfirstpass.help: Use fast settings when encoding first pass

level.name: level
level.help: Specify level (as defined by Annex A)

crf.help: Select the quality for constant quality mode

crf_max.name: crf_max
crf_max.help: In CRF mode, prevents VBV from lowering quality beyond this point.

qp.name: qp
qp.help: Constant quantization parameter rate control method

aq-strength.help: AQ strength. Reduces blocking and blurring in flat and textured areas.

psy-rd.name: psy-rd
psy-rd.help: Strength of psychovisual optimization, in <psy-rd>:<psy-trellis> format.

rc-lookahead.name: rc-lookahead
rc-lookahead.help: Number of frames to look ahead for frametype and ratecontrol

intra-refresh.name: intra-refresh
intra-refresh.help: Use Periodic Intra Refresh instead of IDR frames.

b-bias.name: b-bias
b-bias.help: Influences how often B-frames are used

mixed-refs.name: mixed-refs
mixed-refs.help: One reference per partition, as opposed to one reference per macroblock

cplxblur.name: cplxblur
cplxblur.help: Reduce fluctuations in QP (before curve compression)

partitions.name: partitions
partitions.help: A comma-separated list of partitions to consider. Possible values: p8x8, p4x4, b8x8, i8x8, i4x4, none, all

slice-max-size.name: slice-max-size
slice-max-size.help: Limit the size of each slice in bytes

nal-hrd.name: nal-hrd
nal-hrd.help: Signal HRD information (requires vbv-bufsize; cbr not allowed in .mp4)

forced-idr.name: forced-idr
forced-idr.help: If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames.

chromaoffset.name: chromaoffset
chromaoffset.help: QP difference between chroma and luma

x264-params.name: x264-params
x264-params.help: Override the x264 configuration using a :-separated list of key=value parameters

gpu.help: Selects which NVENC capable GPU to use. First GPU is 0, second is 1, and so on.

delay.name: delay
delay.help: Delay frame output by the given amount of frames

no-scenecut.name: no-scenecut
no-scenecut.help: When lookahead is enabled, set this to 1 to disable adaptive I-frame insertion at scene cuts

forced-idr.name: forced-idr
forced-idr.help: If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames.

b_adapt.name: b_adapt
b_adapt.help: When lookahead is enabled, set this to 0 to disable adaptive B-frame decision

spatial-aq.name: spatial-aq
spatial-aq.help: set to 1 to enable Spatial AQ

temporal-aq.name: temporal-aq
temporal-aq.help: set to 1 to enable Temporal AQ

zerolatency.name: zerolatency
zerolatency.help: Set 1 to indicate zero latency operation (no reordering delay)

nonref_p.name: nonref_p
nonref_p.help: Set this to 1 to enable automatic insertion of non-reference P-frames

strict_gop.name: strict_gop
strict_gop.help: Set 1 to minimize GOP-to-GOP rate fluctuations

aq-strength.name: aq-strength
aq-strength.help: When Spatial AQ is enabled, this field is used to specify AQ strength. AQ strength scale is from 1 (low) - 15 (aggressive)

cq.name: cq
cq.help: Set target quality level (0 to 51, 0 means automatic) for constant quality mode in VBR rate control
